subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Shaquille O’Neal predicted 10 to 15 more victories for the Knicks this season, following last season’s poor record that led to the hiring of Coach Mike D’Antoni.
snippet: Shaquille O’Neal predicted 10 to 15 more victories for the Knicks this season, following last season’s poor record that led to the hiring of Coach Mike D’Antoni.
